definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: People wrestle in Delhi for water.
sentences.chinese: 新德里人民上演抢水的角力。

sentences.english: New Delhi, Moscow and São Paulo also did appallingly.
sentences.chinese: 新德里，莫斯科，圣保罗同样让人不颤而栗。

sentences.english: I see India from Lumbini Nepal to Sonauli India, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我想从尼泊尔加德满都陆路去印度新德里，有班车吗？

sentences.english: Tashi then went on to the University of New Delhi to gain a Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology.
sentences.chinese: 后来扎西赴新德里大学取得社会学学士。

sentences.english: I can't go back to the village after an M.B.A. Delhi has more money, better quality of life.
sentences.chinese: 新德里生活条件更好，钱挣得也多。

sentences.english: Wish NDTV takes a note of this.
sentences.chinese: 希望新德里电视台注意到这一点。

sentences.english: “More than 100, 000 foreigners will be in the city, ” Vijay Babli, the leader of more than 1, 200 beggar families living in New Delhi’s Rohini’s Lal Quarter, told the Hindustan Times.
sentences.chinese: 运动会期间将有超过十万外国人住在新德里。

sentences.english: Sulabh International Toilet Museum, New Delhi, India.
sentences.chinese: 苏拉巴国际厕所博物馆，新德里，印度。

sentences.english: A myna bird looks as thought it is hitching a lift from its mate in New Delhi, India.
sentences.chinese: 印度新德里有只鹩哥看上去像是搭载着它的小伙伴。

sentences.english: NDTV had reported that India wants to match China's forces.
sentences.chinese: 新德里电视台报道说，印度希望与中国的军队。

sentences.english: A pandit was brought from New Delhello to officiate at the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 结婚仪式的主持则是一名来自新德里的梵学家。

sentences.english: New Delhi PolOffs subsequently met with Delhi-based human rights activists.
sentences.chinese: 新德里使馆的政务官随后会见了新德里的人权活动家。

sentences.english: New Delhi PolOffs subsequently met with Delhi-based human rights activists.
sentences.chinese: 新德里使馆的政务官随后会见了新德里的人权活动家。

sentences.english: Authorities in New Delhi are planning to export cow dung and urine to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 新德里政府正打算把牛粪和牛尿出口到美国。

sentences.english: PBC? - STIP is rated the healthiest building in Delhi by the Government of India.
sentences.chinese: 在新德里，这个地方被印度政府评为最健康的建筑群。

sentences.english: Mr Earnshaw sends Hindley off to college.
sentences.chinese: 恩肖先生将新德里送到了大学。

definition: Bhopal, capital of central Indian state of Madhya Pradesh 中央邦[Zhong1 yang1 bang1]
Delhi/New Delhi, capital of India/same as 新德里[Xin1 De2 li3]
Bangalore, capital of southwest Indian state Karnataka 卡納塔克邦|卡纳塔克邦[Ka3 na4 ta3 ke4 bang1]
Ahmedabad, largest city in west Indian state Gujarat 古吉拉特[Gu3 ji2 la1 te4]
